TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISharePointProjectLogger

summary.span: 表示 SharePoint 日志记录服务，根据指定的 ，可以使 SharePoint 项目扩展将消息记录到“输出”窗口和“错误列表”。

span.span: Represents the SharePoint logging service, which enables SharePoint project extensions to log messages into the **Output** window and **Error List**, depending on the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有记录的消息都转到 "SharePoint 工具" 输出窗口窗格, 执行部署时除外, 在 "输出" 窗口中将消息重新定向到 VS "生成" 窗格。All logged messages go to a "SharePoint Tools" Output window pane, except when performing deployment, when messages are re-directed to the VS "Build" pane in the Output window.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool ActivateOutputWindow ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool ActivateOutputWindow() cil managed

summary.span: 打开“输出”窗口，并激活当前的“输出”窗口窗格。

span.span: Opens the **Output** window and activates the current **Output** window pane.

returns.span: 如果成功，则返回 ；否则返回 。

span.span: Returns if successful; otherwise.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ClearErrorList ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ClearErrorList() cil managed

summary.span: 清除所有与 SharePoint 工具相关的错误消息的“错误列表”。

span.span: Clears the **Error List** of all SharePoint Tool-related error messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与其他 Visual Studio 活动 (如生成) 相关的错误消息将保留在**错误列表**中。Error messages related to other Visual Studio activities (such as building) will remain in the **Error List**.

MemberSignature.Value: public int GetNewSubcategoryId ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 GetNewSubcategoryId() cil managed

summary.span: 返回一个可用于从错误列表中记录和移除消息的子类别标识符。

span.span: Returns a subcategory identifier which can be used to log and remove messages from the error list.
The new subcategory identifier.

MemberSignature.Value: public void RemoveMessages (int subcategoryId);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RemoveMessages(int32 subcategoryId) cil managed

param.name: subcategoryId
param.span: 将要对其移除消息的子类别标识符。

span.span: Subcategory identifier for which messages are to be removed.

summary.span: 从基于消息子类别的错误列表中移除消息。

span.span: Removes messages from the Error List based on the subcategory of the messages.

MemberSignature.Value: public void WriteLine (string message, Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.LogCategory category, string filePath, int lineNumber, int columnNumber);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void WriteLine(string message, valuetype Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.LogCategory category, string filePath, int32 lineNumber, int32 columnNumber) cil managed

span.span: The message text.

param.name: category
param.span: 由 指定的消息日志类别。

span.span: The message log category, specified by .

param.name: filePath
param.span: 带有错误的文件的完整路径。

span.span: The full path to the file with the error.
The line number where the error occurred.
The column number where the error occurred.

summary.span: 根据指定的 ，将消息记录到 SharePoint 工具的“输出”窗口和“错误列表”。

span.span: Logs a message to the SharePoint Tools **Output** window and **Error List** depending on the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 写入[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] ide 时, 如**错误** `lineNumber`窗口, 和`columnNumber`值从零开始, 但当用户代码写入 ide 时, 值是从1开始的。When [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] writes to the IDE, such as the **Error** window, then the `lineNumber` and `columnNumber` values are zero-based, but when user code writes to the IDE, then the values are one-based. 这意味着, 如果你在代码中指定了`lineNumber` 10 `columnNumber`和20的, [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]则会将其报告为第11行和第21列。This means that if, for example, you specify a `lineNumber` of 10 and a `columnNumber` of 20 in your code, [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] reports it as line 11 and column 21.

MemberSignature.Value: public void WriteLine (string message, Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.LogCategory category, string filePath, int lineNumber, int columnNumber, int subcategoryId);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void WriteLine(string message, valuetype Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.LogCategory category, string filePath, int32 lineNumber, int32 columnNumber, int32 subcategoryId) cil managed

The message log category.

param.name: filePath
param.span: 带有错误的文件的完整路径。

span.span: The full path to file with error.
The line number of error.
The column number of error.
The message subcategory identifier.
